channel.title: WebLogic Kubernetes Operator :: WebLogic Kubernetes Toolkit UI
channel.description: These Quick Start guide sections are for users interested in using a Kubernetes cluster. Anyone using OpenShift should follow this track. Configure your Kubernetes client (kubectl) to connect to the Kubernetes cluster. Install WebLogic Kubernetes Operator . Deploy the Domain . Install and Configure the Ingress Controller and add ingress routes to allow access to the WebLogic domain from outside the Kubernetes cluster. Access the ToDo List application .

item.title: Configure Kubernetes Cluster Connectivity
item.description: Client configuration helps you get the necessary connectivity to your Kubernetes cluster.

item.title: Install the WebLogic Kubernetes Operator
item.description: Install the WebLogic Kubernetes Operator in the target Kubernetes cluster.

item.title: Deploy the Domain
item.description: Create and deploy the Kubernetes custom resource for the WebLogic domain.

item.title: Install and Configure the Ingress Controller
item.description: Install and configure an ingress controller.
